property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.http.address
property.description: The task tracker http server address and port. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.admin.address
property.description: The address of the History server admin interface.
